response.overview: Indian Independent Music Awards (IIMA) is the only award celebrating independent artists. Independent singer-songwriters are working towards establishing their distinct identities with fresh unheard tunes & lyrics. To recognize such artists, we bring the 2nd edition of the Indian Independent Music Awards (IIMA). IIMA is a platform celebrating independent artists and their work. In addition to a variety of talented independent artists, the night also featured Shekhar Ravjiani, Salim Merchant, Asees Kaur, Swanand Kirkire & Rashmeet Kaur, who enthralled the audiences with their performances and thoughts.
response.title: Indian Independent Music Awards (IIMA) 2nd Edition
